body: Ok, so I'm on my phone atm. I have the Avicus forums bookmarked so when I got out of Rock climbing practice I clicked that bookmark immediately, as usual. Well, it brought up this screen saying "Checking your browser. Please allow up to 5 seconds" then in fine print underneath it says "DDoS protection bye CloudFire" (I can't remember the last part of the protection name). Well this has never happened before. Does this mean the server is being DDoSed right now? Does it mean I am being DDoSed, or at least attempted to be?
body_tagged: Ok, so I'm on my phone atm. I have the Avicus forums bookmarked so when I got out of Rock climbing practice I clicked that bookmark immediately, as usual. Well, it brought up this screen saying "Checking your browser. Please allow up to 5 seconds" then in fine print underneath it says "DDoS protection bye CloudFire" (I can't remember the last part of the protection name). Well this has never happened before. Does this mean the server is being DDoSed right now? Does it mean I am being DDoSed, or at least attempted to be?
title: DDoS?

replies.body: nu, its just a security check from CloudFlare, making sure you aren't a DDOSer
replies.body_tagged: nu, its just a security check from CloudFlare, making sure you aren't a DDOSer

replies.body:
No, you are not getting DDoSed, neither is the website.

There could have been an unusual spike in trafifc (which is unlikely), or it could have just been random, i've seen it on lots of other websites as well.
replies.body_tagged:
No, you are not getting DDoSed, neither is the website.

There could have been an unusual spike in trafifc (which is unlikely), or it could have just been random, i've seen it on lots of other websites as well.

replies.body:
I don't think so, it's probably just an ad.
You might have a virus, because these messages are appearing, so I would recommend doing a virus scan.
replies.body_tagged:
I don't think so, it's probably just an ad.
You might have a virus, because these messages are appearing, so I would recommend doing a virus scan.

replies.body: Avcus iz ddos must ficks .blAme minplekx 4 nao
